title: Still D.R.E.
description: Iconic West Coast hip-hop track with a relentless, syncopated piano hook, exuding confidence and controlled aggression. Great for power moves and focus-heavy sets.

title: Espresso (Fitness Cover)
description: Bright, upbeat cover with electronic flourishes, driving percussion, and an infectious groove perfect for keeping energy up during cardio.

title: Pump It Louder
description: Thumping EDM rework of a classic hit with punchy bass and party energy, engineered to boost intensity in a crowded gym.

title: APT. (Fitness Cover)
description: Funky modern pop with a groove-laden bass line and smooth, dynamic vocals. Motivational and bouncy, good for keeping energy high throughout a long session.

title: MILLION DOLLAR BABY
description: Modern rap/R&B with rhythmic vocals and a sleek, nocturnal beat. Vibe is aspirational and uplifting; works well as a confidence booster.

title: Boyz In Paris
description: Aggressive eurodance with hard-hitting synths and infectious drops. Ideal for HIIT or intensity peaks; pure adrenaline.

title: Lights Out (Sped Up)
description: Pulsing electronic groove with a driving four-on-the-floor rhythm. Gives a feeling of forward momentum, suitable for steady pace or endurance work.

title: No Limits
description: Hard-hitting, motivational hip-hop with assertive lyrics (but focus is on the relentless, energetic beat). Designed to push through barriers and pump up determination.

title: Lose Control (Fitness Cover)
description: Modern pop/rock with energetic instrumentation and soulful vocals; the arrangement is high-tempo and punchy, fueling both cardio and lifting routines.

title: Wave After Wave
description: Electronic workout track with a smooth build-up and consistent pulsing bass. Feels expansive and rhythmic, perfect for endurance or circuit routines.

title: Miku
description: Upbeat, hyper-melodic chiptune with driving NES and guitar leads, blending high-energy 8-bit sounds and J-pop influences for a euphoric, danceable feel.

title: PARADOX Keygen 3
description: Aggressive, glitchy pulses and game console crunch merge with a groove-based structure, evoking 90s demoscene energy and cyberpunk arcade nights.

title: Moonlit
description: Dreamy, atmospheric chip-ballad with layered square waves, pixelated ambience, and a relaxing uplifting melody reminiscent of retro RPGs.

title: Mindless Souless
description: Inventive, progressive chiptune with syncopated rhythms, experimental synth textures, and an energetic, playful charm.

title: Supersonic
description: Fast, electro-funk 8-bit anthem featuring bright arpeggios and pulsing pads, channeling vintage racing games with a stylish modern twist.

title: Unbreakable Determination (Ninja Gaiden)
description: Intense, driving chip-metal with rapid sequences, heroic minor melodies, and relentless energy, building the spirit of classic gaming boss fights.

title: Ajvar Relish
description: Dub-inspired groove, Commodore 64 basslines, and rhythmic effects deliver a deep, hypnotic, and playful flavor that's perfect for progression.

title: Just One More
description: Explosive chiptune rave, classic Game Boy jungle breaks and bold melodic hooks, great for high-energy work or retro-futuristic dance floors.

title: death bed (coffee for your head)
description: Melancholic yet soothing lo-fi pop. Gentle acoustic guitar and nostalgic vocal samples blend for a tranquil, dreamy sound that eases stress and promotes daydreams.

title: Can We Kiss Forever?
description: Warm, relaxing lo-fi with ethereal vocal hooks and simple, calming beats, creating a vibe of gentle longing and mellow focus.

title: Pastlives
description: Moody, introspective lo-fi instrumental, blending soft, filtered keys with subtle percussion. Ideal for late-night studying and self-reflection.

title: YEAH RIGHT
description: Chill, melodic R&B-influenced beat with understated vocals—mellow and contemplative yet deeply catchy. Suitable for background motivation and zen focus.

title: Eternal Youth
description: Classic lo-fi instrumental with jazzy undertones and a relaxing groove, evoking feelings of nostalgia and calm ideal for a focused work session.

title: the girl i haven't met
description: Dreamy, hopeful track with soft synth melodies and steady, minimal drums. A light and gentle composition for peaceful productivity.

title: i dont wanna know her
description: Calming lo-fi production, hypnotic chord progressions, and emotive vocal snippets, supporting both introspection and gentle focus.

title: u're mine
description: Low-key, atmospheric lo-fi with organic textures and touching vocal lines, creating an immersive, tranquil atmosphere great for studying or relaxing.

title: Ring, Ring
description: Playful, upbeat, and melodic with bright instrumental hooks, providing a light, energizing background for focused activity.

title: I'll Keep You Safe
description: Gentle, moody lo-fi with lush chords and a softly reassuring motif. The perfect calming track to take the edge off anxious work.
